official_title: A bill to name the social security building in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, known as the Mid-Atlantic Program Service Center, the William A. Barrett Social Security Building.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Names the Mid-Atlantic Program Service Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, the William A. Barrett Social Security Building. Names the U.S. Post Office Building in Moorestown, New Jersey, the Edwin B. Forsythe Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to name the social security building in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, known as the Mid-Atlantic Program Service Center, the William A. Barrett Social Security Building.
